com.deniz.balanced.mission.business

Interface MissionBackendService

  • All Superinterfaces:
    FrameworkBackendService<MissionEntity>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    MissionBackendServiceImpl

    public interface MissionBackendService
extends FrameworkBackendService<MissionEntity>
    Interface for backend to be seen from service layer
    Takes entities from dao layer, has all business logic
    Author:
    deniz.yavas
